[Git](https://git-scm.com) is a useful version control manager.

[Pro Git](https://git-scm.com/book) is the ultimate git reference.

A tutorial made at INRIA: [https://tutorial.gitlabpages.inria.fr/git](https://tutorial.gitlabpages.inria.fr/git)

To learn `git`, there are also multiple games:

- [https://learngitbranching.js.org](https://learngitbranching.js.org)
- [https://ohmygit.org](https://ohmygit.org)
